mapper.select: select c.id, c.userId, c.boardId, c.content, c.createDate, u.username from comment c inner join user u on c.userId = u.id where c.boardId = #{boardId} order by c.id desc
select c.id, c.userId, c.boardId, c.content, c.createDate, u.username from comment c inner join user u on c.userId = u.id where c.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into comment(userId, boardId, content, createDate) values(#{userId}, #{boardId}, #{content}, now())
